name: Lifestream - A Haunting Text Adventure
description: Find your missing father and uncover the dark conspiracy surrounding a sacred artifact and an enigmatic brotherhood in this haunting text adventure that combines the best elements of classic interactive fiction and gamebooks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: any DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 65 MB available space Sound Card: optional but recommended Additional Notes: Native resolution: 1366x768; rescales to fill screen
